Sentencas: The crystal structure, sintering characteristics, electrical conductivity and thermal expansion of GdxTi2O7 - delta pyrochlores (1.72 less than or equal to x less than or equal to 2.10) have been studied as potential electrolytes in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Compatibility of GdxTi2O7 pyrochlores (1.72≤x≤2.0) as electrolytes in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that the A-site deficiency of GdxTi2O7 - delta with cubic symmetry showed a wide region of 1.72 < x < 2.03.
Titulo: Compatibility of GdxTi2O7 pyrochlores (1.72≤x≤2.0) as electrolytes in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A-site vacancies promoted the sintering characteristics of these materials.
Titulo: Compatibility of GdxTi2O7 pyrochlores (1.72≤x≤2.0) as electrolytes in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity of the pyrochlores with A-site vacancies was lower than that of GdxTi2O7 in air although the reverse was observed in reducing atmospheres, due to the appearance of electronic conduction.
Titulo: Compatibility of GdxTi2O7 pyrochlores (1.72≤x≤2.0) as electrolytes in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Average linear thermal expansion coefficients of GdxTi2O7 - delta pyrochlores decreased with increasing A-site vacancies.
Titulo: Compatibility of GdxTi2O7 pyrochlores (1.72≤x≤2.0) as electrolytes in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The difference between the TEC in air and in a H-2 atmosphere had a tendency to increase with increasing A-site vacancies.
Titulo: Compatibility of GdxTi2O7 pyrochlores (1.72≤x≤2.0) as electrolytes in high-temperature solid oxide fuel cells
